entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is experiencing a lot of pain and anger. He is described as screaming loudly and wanting to break things.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A calm and wise person who is trying to comfort Harry. He is described as having a 'calm old face'.

relationships.description: Harry feels angry towards Dumbledore, who he perceives as not understanding his pain. This is evident from Harry's screaming and wanting to break things.
Despite feeling angry towards Dumbledore, Harry also desires comfort and understanding from him. This is evident from the fact that Dumbledore is trying to calm Harry down.
